May 12, 1923 D Holme Valley Brass Band Contest (Section A)
Holme Valley Brass Band Contest (Section A) 10 Hymn & Own Choice Test Piece Contest Holme Valley Brass Band Contest holme-valley-brass-band-contest-a
Test Piece Contest
Mirella [arr. Godfrey]
Victoria Park, Holmfirth March (Irresisible): 1. Hepworth, 2. Sowerby Prizes - 1st £14 and cup, 2nd £8, 3rd £6, 4th £4. 3rd annual conytest. 12 bands competed.
April 4, 2012, 9:14 p.m. Oct. 18, 2018, 12:21 p.m.
